entry.title: Qa engineer
entry.text:
#vacancy #fulltime #relocate #вакансия  #работаQA 

QA Engineer - relocation to Germany -  company Excelsior 

The role: testing web and mobile applications in the banking area.

What you should have:

📍BS degree (it's a must-have for getting a work permit).
📍3+ years of experience in testing web and mobile applications.
📍Experience with UI Automation.
📍Selenium, Appium and Kotlin/Java skills.
📍Knowledge of SDLC.
📍Upper-Intermediate English and willing to learn German.

Company offers:

✅Good salary - 2600 EUR/month - and bonus system .
✅Relocation Support.
✅Temporary apartment for the first 3 months.
✅Tickets compensation.
✅Official employment and medical insurance.
✅Drinks and snacks at the office.

Please send any expressions of interest/CV's to 
e: nadiia@skillers.tech
s: tixayaya
t: @nadia_tykha
